arts.ttl: Bloomfield hails Bluebirds victory as a 'big result' for the Hatters
arts.sum: Town finally end lengthy wait for away success

arts.ttl: Clark's stunner sees Luton bounce back to finally end away winless run at Cardiff
Cardiff City 1-2 Luton Town: Bluebirds' survival hopes take major dent after throwing away lead against Hatters
arts.sum: Cardiff City's chances of surviving relegation took a major dent after a 2-1 defeat by fellow strugglers Luton Town on a dreadful night for the Bluebirds. Just seven minutes later, Luton were the beneficiaries from a half-cleared cross, with Clark chesting a ball into his own path before rocketing a volley into the top corner past the helpless Ethan Horvath.

arts.ttl: Luton hit back to earn vital victory at Cardiff
arts.sum: Luton claimed a precious 2-1 victory over Cardiff in their Championship relegation battle as the contest was overshadowed by an injury to Aaron Ramsey that threatens to rule the Wales captain out of World Cup action.

arts.ttl: Aaron Ramsey injury adds to Cardiff woes as they lose to fellow strugglers Luton
arts.sum: The Hatters’ second away league win of the season takes them to within two points of safety.

arts.ttl: Hatters duo Morris and McGuinness return to face Bluebirds
arts.sum: Championship: Cardiff City v Luton Town

arts.ttl: McGuinness issues a rallying cry to Luton's fans ahead of Cardiff return
arts.sum: Centre half heads back to his former club this evening

arts.ttl: Forest lose appeal against fine for 'Luton fan' Attwell post
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest were fined for a social media post criticising video assistant referee Stuart Attwell last season.
